paper_abstract: Dagstuhl hosted a three-day seminar on the Future Internet on March 25-27, 2013. At the seminar, about 40 invited researchers from academia and industry discussed the promises, approaches, and open challenges of the Future Internet. This report gives a general overview of the presentations and outcomes of discussions of the seminar.
paper_title: Is SDN the De-constraining Constraint of the Future Internet?
